subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony’s triple-double and 15 3-pointers combined from Steve Novak and J.R. Smith helped fuel one of the Knicks’ most important victories of the season.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony’s triple-double and 15 3-pointers combined from Steve Novak and J.R. Smith helped fuel one of the Knicks’ most important victories of the season.
